attributes.comment:
Please reconsider increasing the fee for the I-600A/I-171H/fingerprinting. We are
adopting from China and the wait has become much longer recently. We are
looking at having to renew our application at least once, if not twice. The costs
associated with adoption are already difficult for many families and this fee
increase will only make it worse. Please consider this: had we given birth to this
child we would not have to ask for approval, get fingerprinted, or pay fees. We
want to bring an orphan child into our home and would like you to consider the
implications of a fee increase and whether or not it is fair. We are asking that you
do not increase the fees.

Sincerely,

Ann Densmore
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Ann R. Densmore
